About Us

mobile toilet provider in kenya

Why Choose Us

About Urbanloos - Kenya's Mobile Toilet Experts.

Urbanloos is Kenya's leading provider of mobile toilet rental solutions. We are committed to delivering clean, professional, and convenient sanitation services for all kinds of events, including weddings, festivals, corporate functions, and construction sites.

With offices in Naivasha (Nakuru County) and Nyahururu (Laikipia County), we proudly serve Nyahururu, Olkalou, Nakuru, Naivasha, Nanyuki, Narok, Nyandarua, Kinangop, and the surrounding areas. Our team ensures every portable toilet is clean, well-stocked, and managed by a professional attendant—at no extra charge.

From Standard budget-friendly units to VIP luxury mobile restrooms, Urbanloos has the perfect sanitation solution tailored to your event size, location, and budget.
